00018 void Controller::start(){
00019         Fl_Window *window = new Fl_Window(800, 600);
00020         Fl_Button *lightSensor = new Fl_Button((window->w())-50, 10, 45, 45, "light");
00021         Fl_Button *soundSensor = new Fl_Button((window->w())-50, 55, 45, 45, "sound");
00022         drawwindow = new DrawWindow(*this,0,0,400,400);
00023         window->add(drawwindow);
00024         lightSensor->callback(callback);
00025         soundSensor->callback(callback);
00026         window->show();
00027         Fl::run();
